DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response indicating whether patient used CDK4 or 6 inhibitor.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient previously used CDK4/6i?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been previously treated with any of the following CDK4/6 inhibitors: Palbociclib or Ibrance, Ribociclib or Kisqali, and Abemaciclib or Verzenio?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient initiated any of the CDK4/6 inhibitors (Palbociclib or Ibrance, Ribociclib or Kisqali, Abemaciclib or Verzenio) within 30 days prior to consenting to Step 0 or have they received a prescription order with stated intent to initiate within 30 days following Step 0 consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient initiate their CDK 4/6 inhibitors within 30 days of the date of Step 0 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient intend to receive a CDK4/6 inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient initiated their CDK4/6 inhibitor (Palbociclib or Ibrance, Ribociclib or Kisqali, Abemaciclib or Verzenio) provided/supplied in single agent blister packs, within 30 days prior to consenting to Step 0 or have they received a prescription order with stated intent to initiate within 30 days following Step 0 consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient initiate their CDK4/6 inhibitor (blister pack) within 30 days of date of Step 0 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have prior therapy with CDK4/6 inhibition?
